bibl.note: [Introduction: The origins of scholia (a summary of principal points in the earlier discussion.] - Minuscule and Other Small Scripts: The Evidence. - "Scholia of the Byzantine form could have existed earlier than the ninth century."

[Introduction: The origins of scholia (a summary of principal points in the earlier discussion.] - Minuscule and Other Small Scripts: The Evidence. - "Scholia of the Byzantine form could have existed earlier than the ninth century."
